biotools.summary: Intersection-union survival mixture-adjusted mediation test (IUSMMT) is a R procedure for examining whether a set of gene-based methylation loci affects cancer survival through gene expression under the framework of mixed models.

bioschemas.name: IUSMMT
bioschemas.summary: Intersection-union survival mixture-adjusted mediation test (IUSMMT) is a R procedure for examining whether a set of gene-based methylation loci affects cancer survival through gene expression under the framework of mixed models.
